   19: %%
   20: -module(os_mon_SUITE).
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: %% Test server specific exports
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   25: 
   26: %% Test cases
   27: -export([app_file/1, appup_file/1, config/1]).
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   32: 
   33: all() -> 
   34:     case os:type() of
   35:         {unix, sunos} -> [app_file, appup_file, config];
   36:         _OS -> [app_file, appup_file]
   37:     end.
   38: 
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   43:     application:stop(os_mon),
   44:     ok.
   45: 
   46: %% Testing .app file
   47: app_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   48:     ok = test_server:app_test(os_mon),
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: appup_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     ok = test_server:appup_test(os_mon).
   53: 
   54: %% Test OS_Mon configuration
   55: config(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   56: 
   57:     IsReg = fun(Name) -> is_pid(whereis(Name)) end,
   58:     IsNotReg = fun(Name) -> undefined == whereis(Name) end,
   59: 
   60:     ok = application:start(os_mon),
   61:     true = lists:all(IsReg, [cpu_sup, disksup, memsup]),
   62:     ok = application:stop(os_mon),
   63: 
   64:     ok = application:set_env(os_mon, start_cpu_sup, false),
   65:     ok = application:start(os_mon),
   66:     true = lists:all(IsReg, [disksup, memsup]),
   67:     true = IsNotReg(cpu_sup),
   68:     ok = application:stop(os_mon),
   69:     ok = application:set_env(os_mon, start_cpu_sup, true),
   70: 
   71:     ok = application:set_env(os_mon, start_disksup, false),
   72:     ok = application:start(os_mon),
   73:     true = lists:all(IsReg, [cpu_sup, memsup]),
   74:     true = IsNotReg(disksup),
   75:     ok = application:stop(os_mon),
   76:     ok = application:set_env(os_mon, start_disksup, true),
   77: 
   78:     ok = application:set_env(os_mon, start_memsup, false),
   79:     ok = application:start(os_mon),
   80:     true = lists:all(IsReg, [cpu_sup, disksup]),
   81:     true = IsNotReg(memsup),
   82:     ok = application:stop(os_mon),
   83:     ok = application:set_env(os_mon, start_memsup, true),
   84: 
   85:     ok.
